segments.text: I see the girl standing next to the boy, reaching up for a cookie with an open palm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit happy seeing her excitement and anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's aware of the danger they're in, standing on that slippery floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks like he's about to lose his balance, and I hope she's ready to catch him if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they make a good team, working together to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what they would do if they heard their mother coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad thinking about them getting into trouble, but I also hope they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they're careful and don't make a mess with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're being quite mischievous, but I can't help admiring their teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they're aware of the water overflowing from the sink and making the floor slippery and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit disgusted thinking about the water damage that might be happening to the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR
